benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/tags - Add tags to account

covered: Valid Payload scenarios including multiple and single tag additions and backward compatibility (TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05, TC18, TC24).
Input validation and error handling for invalid payloads and IDs (TC07, TC08, TC09, TC10, TC11, TC12, TC13, TC14, TC17).
Authorization handling (401) for missing credentials (TC11, TC15).
Server error handling (503) for dependency failures (TC16).
Large payload support and performance test (TC18, TC20).
No-tags-before addition and merging: tests for adding tags to an account with existing tags (TC04, TC05).
gaps: Rate limiting / throttling tests are not present.
Caching behavior and ETag/Cache-Control verification are not tested.
403 Forbidden authorization path not covered (only 401 is tested).
PUT/PATCH/DELETE method coverage is outside this story and not tested here.
500 Internal Server Error scenarios beyond 503 (e.g., DB failure scenarios) are not tested.
More extensive heavy-load concurrency tests beyond 10 clients could be added.
recommendations: Add rate-limiting tests to verify system behavior under high request volumes.
Add caching header tests (ETag, Cache-Control) to validate caching behavior.
Add explicit 403 Forbidden test cases for insufficient permissions.
Consider adding 500-level failure scenarios to broaden error handling coverage (DB failure, network issues).
Expand concurrency tests to higher client counts and longer durations to observe idempotency and race conditions.
Enhance header security tests to include additional headers and validate against injection in all header values.
